May Contain/ Peut Contenir: Bismuth Oxychloride (CI

chunk: Seed Oil, Kaolin, Dimethicone, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Panthenyl Triacetate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil. May Contain/ Peut Contenir: Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
